text: Michelle Nicole Creber (born September 7, 1999) is a Canadian voice actress, actress and singer who is best known for voicing Apple Bloom, as well as the singing voice for Sweetie Belle in My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic. She released her first solo album titled Timeless: Songs of a Century on August 28, 2012. The album features popular musicians from the brony community. She also hosts her own Internet radio show called Saturday Night Songs, on the brony media network "Everfree Network". and Michelle Creber burps from youtube videos. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Michelle Creber at the Internet Movie Database Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian singers Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian child actors Category:Canadian dancers Category:Musicians from Vancouver
title: Michelle Creber
